description:
The pants are crafted from a blend of 90 % recycled polyester and 10 % spandex, offering a 4-way stretch grid-textured fleece fabric. This innovative material provides excellent insulation by trapping heat close to your body and efficiently wicks away moisture, keeping you dry and comfortable throughout your activities.

To combat odours and bacteria buildup, we have incorporated the SilverClear® antimicrobial treatment. This treatment ensures high efficacy against odours and bacteria, allowing you to stay fresh even during extended wear.

The pants feature flatlock seams construction, reducing chafing and increasing overall comfort. This design detail ensures a smooth and irritation-free experience, allowing you to focus on your outdoor pursuits without distractions. To enhance comfort and mobility, we have included a gusseted crotch in the pants. This feature provides additional room and freedom of movement. The elastic waistband also offers a secure and adjustable fit.
name: Hooke Grid Base Layer Bottom - Mens
